Text.Value: Like, any kind of birds, or...
Pretty ones. With colours and stuff.
Birds.
I made a bucket of coins off him. When we get back to the gate, I'll take you to a museum.
Huh. Keep it up, little brother - might be I can sell you some day.
I miss watching your artist paint.
Like ma always wanted.
A few, yeah.
What's wrong with the artist?
Did I see you drawing something earlier?
Did that artist really paint all those things?
Aw.
You got coin?
Why?
Don't pretend you know what that means. What kind of drawin' you want?
He what?
Says his muse made him do it.
Here, make your fella draw me something.
Says he did, yeah.
Who's that, then?
Besides the bleedin' obvious? He misses the sun.
Gods, little brother - read a bleedin' book.
So? Can do a better job than that ponce you sold.
Needs light to work, he says. We had a chat - turns out he needs his eyes more.
They got paintings in those?
Yeah, all right, fine. Who are you, his muse?

Synopsis: Brem and Garias are brothers, ADing back and forth about the artist they've taken captive (or sold)
